postScript:
:SET &APP_CODE_BACKUP_PATH# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.app_backup_path")
:SET &APP_RUN_MODE# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.instance_run_mode")
:SET &APP_RUN_MODE# = '&APP_RUN_MODE#'

:SET &SFTP_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.sftp_user")
:SET &SFTP_PASSWORD# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.sftp_password")
:SET &SFTP_HOME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.sftp_home")

:PUBLISH &APP_CODE_BACKUP_PATH#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &APP_RUN_MODE#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &SFTP_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SFTP_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SFTP_HOME#,,WORKFLOW

:DEFINE &AFAIL#, string, 2

:SET &AFSM_CHECK# = 0

! WMS Module
:SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#, '*"module_name":"WMS"*')
:IF &RET# = "Y"
: SET &WMS_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].app_username")
: SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].app_url")
: SET &WMS_PORT# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].app_port")
: IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# <> "N/A" OR ""
:   SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].servers[?(@.machine_function == 'WMS')].server")
:   SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].servers[?(@.machine_function == 'WMS')].should_run")
:   SET &AFSM_CHECK# = &AFSM_CHECK# + 1
: ELSE
:   SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:   SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:   SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
: ENDIF
: SET &WMS_CONTENT# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')]")
: SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&WMS_CONTENT#, "*WMS-FAIL*")
: IF &RET# = "Y"
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].servers[?(@.machine_function == 'WMS-FAIL')].server")
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].servers[?(@.machine_function == 'WMS-FAIL')].should_run")
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'WMS')].failover_app_url")
: ELSE
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:   SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
: ENDIF
:ELSE
:  SET &WMS_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:  SET &WMS_PORT# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "true"
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "false"
:  SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "N"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "true"
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "false"
:  SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "N"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PORT#,,WORKFLOW

! REFS Module
:SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#, '*"module_name":"REFS"*')

:  SET &REFS_USERNAME# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].app_username")

:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].servers[?(@.machine_function == 'REFS-FAIL')].should_run")
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = JSON_GET_VALUE(&RESPONSE_CONTENT#,"$.modules[?(@.module_name == 'REFS')].failover_app_url")
:  ELSE
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:    SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:  ENDIF
:ELSE
:  SET &REFS_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:  SET &REFS_PORT# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "true"
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "false"
:  SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = "N"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "true"
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "Y"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "false"
:  SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = "N"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &REFS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
